entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 10:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: NNW 37 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
